high.mackenzie.autumn.lang.compiler.compilers

Class FunctionCompiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • high.mackenzie.autumn.lang.compiler.compilers.FunctionCompiler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICompiler

    public final class FunctionCompiler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICompiler
    An instance of this class controls the compilation of a function-definition.

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      org.objectweb.asm.tree.InsnList instructions
      These are the bytecode instructions that constitute the body of the function.

      This object manages the allocation of user-visible labels in the function.

      This object represents the program that contains the function.

      This label marks the location that recur-statements redirect execution to.

      This object manages the allocation of local variables in the function.

      These are the bytecode declarations of the try-catch blocks in the function.
      CustomMethod type
      This is the type-system representation of the function.
      VariableManipulator vars
      This object simplifies the generation of bytecode that manipulates local variables.
      java.util.List<org.objectweb.asm.tree.LabelNode> yields
      These labels mark the reentry points of yield statements.

    • Field Detail

      • program

        public final ProgramCompiler program
        This object represents the program that contains the function. More specifically, this is the compiler that is compiling the program.

      • module

        public final ModuleCompiler module
        This object represents the module that contains the function. More specifically, this is the compiler that is compiling the module.

      • node

        public final FunctionDefinition node
        This is the Abstract-Syntax-Tree representation of the function.

      • trycatches

        public final java.util.List<org.objectweb.asm.tree.TryCatchBlockNode> trycatches
        These are the bytecode declarations of the try-catch blocks in the function.

      • instructions

        public final org.objectweb.asm.tree.InsnList instructions
        These are the bytecode instructions that constitute the body of the function.

      • type

        public final CustomMethod type
        This is the type-system representation of the function.

      • scope

        public final VariableScope scope
        This object manages the allocation of local variables in the function.

      • vars

        public final VariableManipulator vars
        This object simplifies the generation of bytecode that manipulates local variables.

      • labels

        public final LabelScope labels
        This object manages the allocation of user-visible labels in the function.

      • recur_label

        public final org.objectweb.asm.tree.LabelNode recur_label
        This label marks the location that recur-statements redirect execution to.

      • yields

        public final java.util.List<org.objectweb.asm.tree.LabelNode> yields
        These labels mark the reentry points of yield statements.

        Sole Constructor.

        module - is the compiler of the module that this definition is part of.
        node - is the AST node that represents this definition.

      • build

        public org.objectweb.asm.tree.MethodNode build()

      • isReturnTypeVoid

        public boolean isReturnTypeVoid()
        This convenience function determines whether the function's return-type is void.
        Returns:
        true, iff the function returns void.

      • isGenerator

        public boolean isGenerator()
        This method determines whether the function is a generator function.

        A generator function is a function that contains some form of yield statement.

        Returns:
        true, if the function is a generator function.

      • isAnnotationPresent

        public boolean isAnnotationPresent(IAnnotationType anno)
        This method determines whether a particular annotation is applied to this method.
        Parameters:
        anno - is the type of the annotation.
        Returns:
        true, iff an annotation of the specified type is applied to this function.

      • yieldField

        public org.objectweb.asm.tree.FieldNode yieldField()
        This function generates the field used to store the state of a generator function.
        Returns:
        the field that stores the function's state between invocations.
